tweet: @kissmyaster  Don't get me started on Buckthorn. That is also a nasty plant here.  Hope your Bittersweet never becomes a problem out there.
@kissmyaster Celastrus orbiculatus is the scourge of the Northeast.  Very much like Kudzu out here.
@kissmyaster  I don't like seeing invasive plants used as holiday decor. It conjures up images of oriental bittersweet wreaths in my mind.
@katiehoke No, problem. I look forward to talking to you on Monday.
@cityslipper Definitely. I'll bring some imaginary wine with me. Oops no, I drank that already.
